Does the `rescanfromheight` command only work on small wallets?

No, the `rescanfromheight` command can be used on wallets of any size. However, it's worth noting that rescanning a very large wallet can take a significant amount of time, potentially minutes or even hours, depending on the size of the wallet and the height from which you're rescanning.

rescanfromheight (height)

Rescans the current wallet from a specified height

Arguments:
1. "height"   (int, optional) Defaults to 0, height to start rescanning from

Note: This call can take minutes or even hours to complete on very large wallets and rescans

Examples:

Initiate rescan of entire chain
> verus rescanfromheight

Initiate rescan from block 1000000
> verus rescanfromheight 1000000
